paper_abstract: In the paper, we investigate a reaction-diffusion system known as the Sel'kov model under the homogeneous Dirichlet boundary condition. First, we give a priori estimates of non-negative steady-state solutions. Then, we obtain some results of the non-existence and existence of positive steady-state solutions. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Positive steady-state solutions of the Sel'kov model
